page.title: 13MOUNTAINS
page.content: MOUNTAINS _________ With all the mountains around us we get a lot of visitors who come along to climb them.Not many of the local people take up mountaineering,maybe because they are afraid they will fall off.We see the mountain rescue helicopter from R.A.F Valley on Anglesey nearly every weekend.They are helped by the OGWEN VALLEY MOUNTAIN RESCUE TEAM.The team is made up of volunteers who are interested in climbing.Sir John Hunt and his men used the TRYFAN and GLYDERAU mountains to train in before they conquered Everest in 1953.A lot of aeroplanes came down in the mountains during the war years.The mountains are part of the SNOWDONIA NATIONAL PARK .
